To retrieve the display name of the user who made the vote with ID 6347, we need to join the 'votes' table with the 'users' table using the foreign key relationship between 'UserId' in 'votes' and 'Id' in 'users'.
The 'Id' column in the 'votes' table is needed to identify the specific vote record we are interested in.
The 'DisplayName' column in the 'users' table is needed to retrieve the display name of the user who made the vote.
